  "title": "Graphics Designer",
  "description": "FirstExcelsia is a firm of highly versatile and renowned Human Resources, Organisational Development and Management consultants with operations across several states in Nigeria. We have an in-depth understanding of the Nigerian business terrain and we are very passionate about partnering with indigenous organisations to develop glocalised HR solutions, processes and structures required to develop and effectively drive our clients&#39; corporate strategies. The firm commenced operations in 2016 and currently has a team of consultants that have successfully managed numerous Organisational Development, Human Resources and Management Consulting projects in varying leadership capacities across all sectors of the Nigerian Economy.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Graphics Designer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Advertising

Job Summary


	Our client is seeking a creative and detail-oriented Graphic Designer with proven experience in motion design to join its growing team.
	The ideal role holder will be responsible for developing visual content across digital platforms, including animations, social media content, product visuals, marketing campaigns, and presentations.


Job Responsibilities


	Design high-quality static and motion graphics for digital and print platforms
	Create engaging animations for social media, product demos, ads, and presentations
	Collaborate with marketing, product, and content teams to bring ideas to life visually
	Maintain brand consistency across all design outputs
	Stay updated with design and motion trends to continuously elevate creative execution
	Develop graphics content adherent to strict deadlines and maintain a consistent content calendar aligned with marketing campaigns and promotions
	Collaborate with team members to brainstorm, plan, and produce creative marketing content


Requirements
Person Specification:


	B.Sc./HND in Mass Communication, or any related field.
	Minimum of 3 years of experience in Graphics Design, with required experience in Motion Graphics.
	Strong portfolio in Graphics Design and Motion Graphics
	Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (After Effects, Illustrator, Photoshop, Premiere Pro)
	Experience creating short-form animations, explainer videos, and visual effects
	Strong typography, color theory, and layout skills
	Proficiency in editing tools such as Canva, CapCut, InShot, or similar platforms.
	Experience in retail or visual merchandising is an added advantage.


Salary
N3,600,000 &ndash; N4,800,000 Annually.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should email their CV to:&nbsp;talentsearch@firstexcelsia.com&nbsp;using &ldquo;Graphics Designer&rdquo; as the subject of the email.",

Graphics Designer Job at FirstExcelsia Professional Services




        
    

        
        FirstExcelsia is a firm of highly versatile and renowned Human Resources, Organisational Development and Management consultants with operations across several states in Nigeria. We have an in-depth understanding of the Nigerian business terrain and we are very passionate about partnering with indigenous organisations to develop glocalised HR solutions, processes and structures required to develop and effectively drive our clients' corporate strategies. The firm commenced operations in 2016 and currently has a team of consultants that have successfully managed numerous Organisational Development, Human Resources and Management Consulting projects in varying leadership capacities across all sectors of the Nigerian Economy.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:
     

            
    



Job Position: Graphics Designer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Advertising

Job Summary


	Our client is seeking a creative and detail-oriented Graphic Designer with proven experience in motion design to join its growing team.
	The ideal role holder will be responsible for developing visual content across digital platforms, including animations, social media content, product visuals, marketing campaigns, and presentations.


Job Responsibilities


	Design high-quality static and motion graphics for digital and print platforms
	Create engaging animations for social media, product demos, ads, and presentations
	Collaborate with marketing, product, and content teams to bring ideas to life visually
	Maintain brand consistency across all design outputs
	Stay updated with design and motion trends to continuously elevate creative execution
	Develop graphics content adherent to strict deadlines and maintain a consistent content calendar aligned with marketing campaigns and promotions
	Collaborate with team members to brainstorm, plan, and produce creative marketing content


Requirements
Person Specification:


	B.Sc./HND in Mass Communication, or any related field.
	Minimum of 3 years of experience in Graphics Design, with required experience in Motion Graphics.
	Strong portfolio in Graphics Design and Motion Graphics
	Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (After Effects, Illustrator, Photoshop, Premiere Pro)
	Experience creating short-form animations, explainer videos, and visual effects
	Strong typography, color theory, and layout skills
	Proficiency in editing tools such as Canva, CapCut, InShot, or similar platforms.
	Experience in retail or visual merchandising is an added advantage.


Salary
N3,600,000 – N4,800,000 Annually.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should email their CV to: talentsearch@firstexcelsia.com using “Graphics Designer” as the subject of the email.
